title: Cloudmesh Virtual Cluster Management for Data Intensive Applications
description: Cloudmesh is an important component to deliver a software-defined system  encompassing virtualized and bare-metal infrastructure, networks, application, systems and platform software  with a unifying goal of providing Cloud Testbeds as a Service (CTaaS). Cloudmesh federates a number of resources from academia and industry. This includes existing FutureSystems, Amazon Web Services, Azure, HP Cloud, Karlsruhe using various technologies. An high level architectural image is provided at {http://cloudmesh.github.io/introduction_to_cloud_computing/_images/cloudmesh-arch-2013.png
